#BlackMagicCraft #Episode142

In this topic I discuss the rather difficult subject to cover of how I actually implement and use terrain in my games of Dungeons & Dragons. How to I approach what to use and when, and how I physically implement it in my game while minimizing the disruption and slowdown to the game.
